name: Adam Campbell
description: I’m Originally from Italy(Padova),and live in virginia va…. i have one daughter her name is michelle she lives with me i am 52 yrs old…I’m a Sub-Contractor, We build houses and renovate damaged and abandoned properties world wide….. would like to find a nice looking woman with traditional values, very romantic and with a fine culture. Not just with knowledge but with a good sense of life……. Am interested in that woman who will always understand me,Love me ,Cherish me and can understand that we both have ideas to share forever in Love and trust…
